content: अवतरणं {@--1@} Descending for bathing in water &c., गंगा°, अप्सरस्तीर्थ°; descending or alighting (in general), coming down; स्तन्य°. {@--2@} An incarnation; see अवतार. {@--3@} Crossing. {@--4@} Sudden disappearance. {@--5@} Steps or stairs leading to a river. {@--6@} A holy bathing-place (तीर्थ). {@--7@} Translating from one language into another. {@--8@} Introduction. {@--9@} An extract, a quotation.
